changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment:
âœ¨ feat: Added primary and secondary font families
âœ¨ feat: Added Arabic font families (`ar-primary`, `ar-secondary`)

task.summary: âœ¨ feat: Added wakatime badge
âœ¨ chore: Added IDE config files
âœ¨ feat(components): Added `Card`, `Progress`, `Separator` components and Quran player. Created Quran surah page. Updated layout and home page.

feat(quran): Add Quran functionality
This commit introduces several new features related to the Quran:
Added Card, Progress, and Separator components for improved UI.
Implemented a Quran player for audio playback.
Created a dedicated Quran surah page for viewing individual surahs.
Updated the overall layout and home page design.
Added new tabs for easier navigation (Surah, Juz, Page)
Added Juz and Page views.
Added Basic search functionality
Added loading screen with custom animation.
Added Bismillah image to surah view
Added audio controls
Implemented basic copy and share functionality for verses.
Added Hadith Section with book and chapter views.
Added loading screens for Hadith and Quran pages.
Improved error handling.

âœ¨ feat(quran/hadith): Implemented audio transcription and added context to Hadith view
Improved the `audio-recorder` component by adding audio transcription functionality.
fixed build
changed url to production
typo in api endpoint
fix: double bismillah audio fatiha
reflow endpoint
added logger

Commit message: ``` Subject: [PATCH] feat: add Quran quiz feature with results and navigation
- Implement quiz start page with dynamic question generation - Add state management for quiz progress, scoring, and audio control - Create ResultsCard component to display user scores and feedback - Integrate quiz navigation into existing surah/juz views - Add developer notice modal for incomplete features - Update store to track modal visibility state
removed useless toast
added alert-dialog
changed logo

âœ¨ feat(podcasts): Added podcasts page and components
âœ¨ feat(quiz): Added quiz settings to customize the quiz

âœ¨ feat(images): Updated image formats to webp in `vite.config.js`
â™»ï¸ refactor(text): Updated copy in `/dev-notice` and fixed `/pitch` iframe sizing
â™»ï¸ refactor(pitch): Removed stray "npm r" in `/pitch` and updated IDEA metadata

âœ¨ feat: Implemented audio player controls

âœ¨ feat: Added previous/next and 15sec skip buttons
âœ¨ feat: Added media session support to audio player with metadata and action handlers
âœ¨ feat: Added Umami analytics script to `+layout.svelte`

âœ¨ feat: Added Umami analytics script to +layout.svelte
This commit integrates Umami analytics tracking into the application's root layout component to enable usage monitoring. The analytics script is added directly to the layout template to ensure it loads on all pages. Additionally, minor syntax adjustments were made to click handlers in the dua page component for consistency.

âœ¨ feat: Integrated Umami analytics and enhanced search/filter functionality
- Upped minor version to 0.7.1 - Added Umami analytics script to +layout.svelte for comprehensive usage tracking across all pages. - Implemented advanced filtering logic for surahs, juzs, and pages in the Quran page component: - Filters based on search query matching name, Arabic name, number, or related attributes. - Replaced static lists with derived filtered lists for dynamic updates. - Updated quiz functionality: - Improved question generation logic with validated user settings (number of questions, range of surahs). - Enhanced results display with detailed feedback, including correct/incorrect answers and audio playback options. - Refactored state management and lifecycle hooks for better performance and maintainability. - Fixed minor syntax inconsistencies in click handlers and imports across components. - Updated ResultsCard component for a more detailed and user-friendly quiz results summary. - Adjusted conditional rendering logic in +layout.svelte to exclude specific routes from certain layouts.
ðŸ”§ Chore: Minor code cleanups and consistency improvements.
âœ¨ feat: Updated app icon and implemented navigation to home page
âœ¨ feat: Refactor dev-notice page layout and improve accessibility features
âœ¨ feat: Change event handler from on:click to onclick for consistency

âœ¨ feat(quran): enhance juz/surah handling, audio, and UI
- Standardize event handlers from `on:click` to `onclick` across components - Improve error handling and data validation in juz data fetching - Implement audio preloading and batched loading for smoother playback - Enhance juz view with better verse grouping and basmalah handling - Add responsive layout improvements for mobile views - Update navigation paths for quizzes and podcasts - Remove deprecated mobile carousel implementations - Add error logging and user feedback via toasts - Refactor surah metadata handling and audio URL generation
â™»ï¸ refactor(dua): Added responsive labels to dua actions
âœ¨ feat: Refactor API calls to use centralized URL configuration

âœ¨ feat: Added Umami analytics script to +layout.svelte
This commit integrates Umami analytics tracking into the application's root layout component to enable usage monitoring. The analytics script is added directly to the layout template to ensure it loads on all pages. Additionally, minor syntax adjustments were made to click handlers in the dua page component for consistency.

âœ¨ feat: Integrated Umami analytics and enhanced search/filter functionality
- Upped minor version to 0.7.1 - Added Umami analytics script to +layout.svelte for comprehensive usage tracking across all pages. - Implemented advanced filtering logic for surahs, juzs, and pages in the Quran page component: - Filters based on search query matching name, Arabic name, number, or related attributes. - Replaced static lists with derived filtered lists for dynamic updates. - Updated quiz functionality: - Improved question generation logic with validated user settings (number of questions, range of surahs). - Enhanced results display with detailed feedback, including correct/incorrect answers and audio playback options. - Refactored state management and lifecycle hooks for better performance and maintainability. - Fixed minor syntax inconsistencies in click handlers and imports across components. - Updated ResultsCard component for a more detailed and user-friendly quiz results summary. - Adjusted conditional rendering logic in +layout.svelte to exclude specific routes from certain layouts.
